name: plane
description: Plane is a self-hosted project and issue tracking tool designed for small teams. It features Kanban, timelines, Git syncing, and powerful filters with a sleek UI.

features.title: Issue Tracking
features.description: Create and manage issues with custom fields, priorities, and status workflows

features.title: Kanban Boards
features.description: Visualize work with drag-and-drop kanban boards for agile project management

features.title: Timeline Views
features.description: Plan projects with Gantt-style timeline views showing dependencies and milestones

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync issues with GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket for automated status updates from commits

features.title: Advanced Filters
features.description: Find issues quickly with powerful filtering by assignee, labels, dates, and custom fields

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Mention teammates, add comments, and track activity on issues in real-time

features.title: Cycle Planning
features.description: Organize work into sprints or cycles with velocity tracking and burndown charts

features.title: Custom Workflows
features.description: Define project-specific workflows and automation rules for issue state transitions
